page.title: 12Businesses in Rufforth
page.content: There are {11 farms}in the district, 2 inns and 2 shops.The{village shop is a general store and a post office. opening every day except Tuesday p.m. and Sunday(after 11am)from 7am until 5.30pm.The other shop is an{Antiques} {Shop}which specialises in furniture. It was opened in the spring of 1985. 3 residents take guests into their houses for{Bed and Breakfast}and if they are full other people take in the guests but do not advertise themselves.1 of the{Inns}provides different sorts of entertainment. The other is a typical village pub. Both provide food.{3 mobile shops} visit the village-fish monger,butcher and video library.{3 ice cream vans {come.}Other businesses are agricultural contractor,builder, dog breeder and coal merchant.
